item.title: Saleae Logic Analyser Clone with Ubuntu Linux
item.description:
The Saleae Logic is an 8 channel 24MHz logic analyser.Â  Soon after its launch people in China opened them up to find that they are pretty simple inside and, as sure as night follows day, little workshops in Shenzen started producing clones impossibly cheaply and to be sold through eBay, AliExpress, etc

Follow this link for excellent instruction on other distros and requirements

Type the below command to check if the USB was connected successfully!
